name: protoscript-dev
description: A Protobuf runtime and code generation tool for JavaScript and TypeScript
author: Tate <tatethurston@gmail.com>

scripts.e2e:setup: npm run package:build && (cd e2e/serialization && npm install && npx protoscript)
scripts.examples:each: for e in $(ls examples); do (cd ./examples/"$e" && $npm_config_command); done
scripts.examples:regen: npm run examples:each --command='npx protoscript' && npm run examples:each --command='tsc --noEmit'
scripts.lint: npm run typecheck && prettier --check . && prettier-package-json --list-different '{,example/,}package.json' && eslint .
scripts.package:build: npm install && npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:module && chmod +x dist/compiler.js dist/cli/index.js && cp src/compiler.cmd dist/compiler.cmd && npm run package:prune && npm run package:copy:files
scripts.test:ci: npm run e2e:setup && npm run test --coverage
